short_summary: Unit of Marine Vibro-Core Sampling, Solicitation Number WS4328196045
duration_in_months: If the proposed date of contract start and the contract duration is 3 month and it entrusted the RFP start date to 10 days after the contract award, then the contract date to be post should 2024-07-01.
full_summary:
### Marine Vibrocore Sampling Unit Tender Announcement
#### Government of Canada Procurement
#### Published May 08, 2024

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC) invites bids for the supply of a Marine Vibrocore Sampling Unit to the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan).

**Purchase Details:**

* **Contract Reference Number:** WS4328196045-Doc4572005614
* **Publication Date:** May 08, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 30, 2024, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Scope of Work:** Supply of a Marine Vibrocore Sampling Unit
* **Locations of Operation:** The contracted unit will be used in Nova Scotia.

**Government of Canada's Requiring Department:**

* **Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)**

**Delivery Address:**

* **Contracting Agency:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* **City:** Gatineau, Quebec
* **Postal Code:** K1A 0S5
* **Country:** Canada

**Contact Information:**

* **Tara Sheppard (SPAC/PSPC)**
* **Email:** <tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* **Note:** No contact phone or fax number was provided.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Notice URL:** <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19634066?extsite=MTk2MzQwNjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Instructions to Bidders
All bids must be submitted electronically to the link above and must be received by the assigned closing date and time. Please ensure that the bid includes all specified documentation. A complete procurement package is available upon request.

### Selection Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price. We encourage bidders to provide a thorough understanding of their proposed product and pricing structure.
